name: Project Reflect
description:
What is the game about?

An endless top-down shooter about reflecting enemy bullets without being hit yourself. Get the highest score possible! 

Controls

Left click to move
Right click to use shield, shield will only reflect bullets when fully up
If the shield meter depletes, you can't use shield untill full charge

Story behind the development

This was my first ever real game made using GameMaker Studio 2. Of course, naive as I am, I had a grand concept in mind. You would have been able to traverse multiple levels and kill big bad bosses. I even had a (pretty mediocre) story in mind. This was all scrapped once I realised the scope of the project, and I got a pretty cool shooter out of it!
